venue.name: Getaway Vacation Properties - Killington Vacation Rentals

item.description: FOR A LEISURE DAY IN THE SUN WITH GREAT PEOPLE IN OUR OWN PINK TUBES... FLOAT DOWN THE RIVER FOR ABOUT 3 1/2 HOURS.... THOSE WHO DONE IT BEFORE ME.. SO ITS SO MUCH FUN.... I HOPE YOU WILL JOIN ME FOR AN AFTERNOON.... ON THE WATER OF THE WHITE RIVER..... ONLY FOR $10.00
item.how_to_find_us: ROUTE 100.... UP NORTH ON 89... OFF THE BETHEL EXIT

item.name: TUBING DOWN THE WHITE RIVER FROM STOCKBRIDGE, VT
